title: Shin, Jonghyeok (신종혁)
text:
Experience

2022.11.14 – Present Research scientist, Korea Research Institution of Bioscience and Biotechnology (KRIBB)
2022.07.01 – 2022.10.31 Postdoctoral research associate, Department of Molecular Biosciences (Prof. Andrew D. Ellington), University of Texas at Austin, Austin, TX, United States of America
2019.07.16 – 2022.06.30 Postdoctoral research associate, Carl R. Woese Institute for Genomic Biology (Prof. Yong-Su Jin and Prof. Ting Lu), University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), Urbana, IL, United States of America
2019.03.01 – 2019.06.30 Postdoctoral researcher, Institute of Biotechnology and Bioengineering Research Units (SKKU Biotechnology Researcher), Sungkyunkwan University (SKKU), Suwon, Republic of Korea



Education

2014 - 2019, Ph.D. of Science, Protein Engineering Lab, Dept. of Biotechnology and Bioengineering (Prof. Dae-Hyuk Kweon), Sungkyunkwan University (SKKU), Suwon, Republic of Korea
2012 - 2013, Master of Science, Protein Engineering Lab, Dept. of Biotechnology and Bioengineering (Prof. Dae-Hyuk Kweon), Sungkyunkwan University (SKKU), Suwon, Republic of Korea
2009 - 2012, Bachelor of Science, Genetic Engineering Major, Dept. of Genetic Engineering, Sungkyunkwan University (SKKU), Suwon, Republic of Korea

KRIBB OpenAccess Researcher Profile
